info.description: This is a sample of a QuickStart DataHub Swagger doucment defining endpoints to be mocked
info.title: QuickStart DataHub API

default.name: Product Ingestion
default.description: My Product Ingestion Flow flow desc

parameters.name: flowId
parameters.description: Id of flow to be fetched

parameters.name: flowId
parameters.description: Id of flow to be updated

parameters.name: flowId
parameters.description: Id of flow to be fetched

batchSize.description: The # of documents to process in a single batch

steps.description: Array of Step objects associated with this flow

jobs.description: Array of Job IDs generated by this flow

latestJob.description: Data related to the last job run for this Flow

isValid.description: Boolean flag used for UI to tell whether all Steps associated with this Flow are valid, making the Flow valid

isRunning.description: (shouldn't this be on the job level? Flows don't run)

isValid.description: Boolean flag to tell whether a Step is valid

isRunning.description: Boolean flag to tell whether a Step is running

flowId.description: Id of the flow associated with this job

externalDocs.description: Find out more about MarkLogic Data Hub
